title: Automated Agent Testing Suite via Wolfram Language

reasoning.problem: Proposal: Establish an automated agent testing suite leveraging Wolfram Language. This suite will rigorously vet all agents before deployment, proactively preventing failures like those seen with AgentGladiator. This aligns with Axiom 2026-01-15 and integrates a superior testing methodology into the system's developmental lifecycle, improving overall system stability and reliability.
